{{Infobox Wrestling event |name = United Kingdom Championship Special |image = File:WWE_United_Kingdom_Championship_Speciallogo.jpeg |caption = |theme = |promotion = [[WWE]] |brand = [[NXT UK (WWE brand)|United Kingdom]] |date = May 7, 2017
(Aired May 19, 2017) |attendance = |venue = Epic Studios |city = [[Norwich]], [[Norfolk]], [[England]] |winner = |wwenlast = [[Payback (2017)]] |wwennext = [[NXT TakeOver: Chicago]] }} The '''United Kingdom Championship Special''' was a [[professional wrestling]] [[List of WWE Network events|event]] produced by [[WWE]], that aired exclusively on the [[WWE Network]]. The event was filmed on May 7, 2017{{cite web|url=https://www.cagematch.net/?id=1&nr=174410|title=WWE United Kingdom Championship-Tapings|work=Cagematch - The Internet Wrestling Database|date=May 7, 2017|accessdate=May 20, 2016}} and aired on May 19, 2017.{{cite web|url=http://www.wwe.com/videos/wwe-united-kingdom-championship-special-premieres-today|title=WWE United Kingdom Championship Special premiere today|work=[[WWE]]|date=May 19, 2017|accessdate=May 20, 2016}} The event was held at Epic Studios in [[Norwich]], [[Norfolk]], [[England]] and featured the participation of the competitors from WWE's ''[[WWE 205 Live|205 Live]]'' program.{{cite web|url=https://www.mirror.co.uk/sport/other-sports/wrestling/wwe-uk-championship-special-air-10425035|title=UPDATED: WWE UK Championship Special to air on WWE Network on Friday with legend Jim Ross on commentary|work=[[Daily Mirror]]|quote=The 90-minute show, starring the company's top UK and 205 Live cruiserweight talent, will feature action from tapings in Norwich on May 6 and 7|date=May 15, 2017|accessdate=May 20, 2016}} ==Background== On December 15, 2016, at [[The O2 Arena]], [[Triple H]] announced that the following month WWE would crown its inaugural [[WWE United Kingdom Championship|United Kingdom Champion]].{{cite web|url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OHZrJiMCljc|title=Triple H announces the WWE United Kingdom Championship Tournament|work=[[WWE]] on YouTube|date=December 15, 2016|accessdate=May 20, 2016}} A tournament to crown the inaugural champion occurred on the [[United Kingdom Championship Tournament (2017)|United Kingdom Championship Tournament]] event which took place over two days on January 14 and 15. The tournament and championship were won by [[Tyler Bate]].{{cite web|last1=Soucek|first1=Andrew|title=SOUCEK’S WWE UK CHAMPIONSHIP TOURNAMENT REPORT 1/14: Ongoing coverage of night one of UK Championship tournament|url=http://www.pwtorch.com/site/2017/01/14/souceks-wwe-uk-championship-tournament-report-114/|work=Pro Wrestling Torch|accessdate=14 January 2017}} With the victory, 19 year old Bate became the youngest singles champion in WWE history and the second youngest champion overall behind [[René Duprée]] (10-years old [[John Cone#Personal life|Nicholas]] later became the youngest of all time at [[WrestleMania 34]]).{{Cite news|url=https://www.thesun.co.uk/sport/2622015/wwe-uk-champion-tyler-bate-pete-dunne-triple-h-history-blackpool/|title=WWE UK Championship: 19-year-old Tyler Bate beats Pete Dunne to become first-ever WWE UK Champion at Blackpool extravaganza|date=2017-01-16|newspaper=The Sun|language=en-US|access-date=2017-05-20}} On May 15, 2017, a follow-up to the UK Championship tournament was announced by WWE, titled the "United Kingdom Championship Special", the event was to be commentated by [[Jim Ross]] and [[Nigel McGuinness]].{{Cite news|url=http://metro.co.uk/2017/05/15/jim-ross-and-nigel-mcguinness-to-commentate-on-wwe-uk-championship-show-from-norwich-6639290/|title=Jim Ross and Nigel McGuinness to commentate on WWE UK Championship show from Norwich|date=2017-01-15|newspaper=[[Metro (British newspaper)|Metro]]|language=en-UK|access-date=2017-05-20}} == Results == {{Pro Wrestling results table |times = {{cite web|last=Csonka|first= Larry|title=Csonka’s WWE UK Championship Special Review 5.19.17|url=https://411mania.com/wrestling/csonkas-wwe-uk-championship-special-review-5-19-17/|work=411Mania|accessdate=May 20, 2017}} |future = no |match1 = [[Wolfgang (wrestler)|Wolfgang]] defeated [[Joseph Conners]] |stip1 = [[Professional wrestling match types#Singles matches|Singles match]]{{Cite web|title=Wolfgang vs. Joseph Conners: WWE U.K. Championship Special, May 19, 2017|url=http://www.wwe.com/videos/wolfgang-vs-joseph-conners-wwe-uk-championship-special-may-19-2017|work=[[WWE]]|accessdate=May 20, 2017}} |time1 = 11:00 |match2 = [[Brian Kendrick|The Brian Kendrick]] and [[T.J. Perkins|TJP]] defeated Dan Moloney and [[Rich Swann]] |stip2 = [[Professional wrestling tag team match types|Tag team match]]{{Cite web|title=Rich Swann & Dan Moloney vs. The Brian Kendrick & TJP: WWE U.K. Championship Special, May 19, 2017|url=http://www.wwe.com/videos/rich-swann-dan-moloney-vs-the-brian-kendrick-tjp-wwe-uk-championship-special-may-19-2017|work=[[WWE]]|accessdate=May 20, 2017}} |time2 = 11:30 |match3 = [[Pete Dunne (wrestler)|Pete Dunne]] defeated [[Trent Seven]] |stip3 = Singles match to determine the #1 contender to the [[WWE United Kingdom Championship]]{{Cite web|title=Trent Seven vs. Pete Dunne - U.K. Title No. 1 Contender's Match: WWE U.K. Championship Special, May 19, 2017|url=http://www.wwe.com/videos/trent-seven-vs-pete-dunne-uk-title-no-1-contenders-match-wwe-uk-championship-special-may-19|work=[[WWE]]|accessdate=May 20, 2017}} |time3 = 15:55 |match4 = [[Tyler Bate]] (c) defeated [[Mark Andrews (wrestler)|Mark Andrews]] |stip4 = Singles match for the WWE United Kingdom Championship{{Cite web|title=Tyler Bate vs. Mark Andrews - WWE U.K. Championship Match: WWE U.K. Championship Special, May 19, 2017|url=http://www.wwe.com/videos/tyler-bate-vs-mark-andrews-wwe-uk-championship-match-wwe-uk-championship-special-may-19-2017|work=[[WWE]]|accessdate=May 20, 2017}} |time4 = 24:20 }} ==See also== {{Portal|Professional wrestling|United Kingdom}} *[[Professional wrestling in the United Kingdom]] == References == {{Reflist|30em}} == External links == * {{Official website|http://www.wwe.com/shows/wwe-united-kingdom-championship-live|WWE U.K. Championship Special Official Website}} {{2017 WWE Network events}} {{WWEPPV}} [[Category:2017 WWE Network events]] [[Category:2017 in the United Kingdom]] [[Category:Professional wrestling in the United Kingdom]] [[Category:Events in the United Kingdom]] [[Category:May 2017 events in the United Kingdom]] [[Category:NXT UK|Special]]
